DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1 , open-label , three-period sequential dosing study conduct primarily determine pharmacokinetics Triferic iron administer intravenously healthy adults.. Participation 5 week total duration include Screening , Baseline , Treatment Period , Follow-up . Following Screening , subject admitted clinic Day -1 , prior Baseline ( Day 1 ) . During Treatment Period , subject receive two dos Triferic . Each subject receive single 6-mg dose Triferic administer IV 3 hour ( hr ) one day ( Day 2 ) , single 35-µg/kg dose Triferic administer IV push follow day ( Day 3 ) . On Day 4 , subject discharge clinic return approximately one week later final Follow-up visit .
